get.description: Retrieve The DetailPage Data By Id example: one-piece-100
Retrieve The list Of Anime By keyword example: ?keyworld=attack+on+titan
Retrieve The Search Suggestions by keywords
Retrieve The characters Of An Anime By ID
Retrieve The character Details Of An Anime Character By ID
Retrieve The character Details Of An Anime VoiceActor By ID
Retrieve The list Of Anime By genre example: action
Retrieve The list Of Anime By letter example: A to Z or 0-9
Retrieve The list Of Anime with filters
Retrieve The list Of Episodes By ID
Retrieve Schedule Anime By Date example: ?date=21. Default is CurrentDate
Retrieve Next Episode Schedule Of An Anime By ID example: one-piece-100
Retrieve The list Of Anime By Query example: top-airing
